DzInstanceGroupItem Class Reference
[Scene Items]

Class that create a single instance of another object target node. This instance draws the same as the target node except for transform. More...

#include <dzinstancenode.h>

Detailed Description

Class that create a single instance of another object target node. This instance draws the same as the target node except for transform.

Member Function Documentation

void DzInstanceGroupItem::cacheTransform (  )  [protected]

Calculates and caches transform values for this item.

void DzInstanceGroupItem::calcLocalTransform ( DzVec3 &  pos,
DzQuat &  rot,
DzMatrix3 &  scale 
) const [protected, virtual]

Calculates the typical local-space transform for the item. Subclasses can reimplement this function to provide a different method of calculating the transform (e.g. a bone that is following another bone.

Parameters:
pos This will be set to the translation component of the transform.
rot This will be set to the rotation component of the transform.
scale This will be set to the scale component of the transform.
defaultVals Use the default version of the origin, end point, and orientation instead of the current postion.
void DzInstanceGroupItem::calcWSTransform ( DzTime  tm,
DzVec3 &  pos,
DzQuat &  rot,
DzMatrix3 &  scale,
bool  defaultVals = false 
) const [protected, virtual]

Calculates the typical World-Space transform for the item. Subclasses can reimplement this function to provide a different method of calculating the transform

Parameters:
tm The scene time to perform the calculation at.
pos This will be set to the translation component of the transform.
rot This will be set to the rotation component of the transform.
scale This will be set to the scale component of the transform.
defaultVals Use the default version of the origin, end point, and orientation instead of the current postion.
void DzInstanceGroupItem::copyTransformFromNode ( const DzNode *  node  )  [slot]
Parameters:
node The node to copy transform values from.

Copies the transform values of the given nodes transform properties. Also copies rotation order.

void DzInstanceGroupItem::copyTransformToNode ( DzNode *  node  )  const [slot]
Parameters:
node The node to copy transform values from.

Copies the transform values to the given nodes transform properties. Also copies rotation order
